channel.title: Bing Maps Control on csMacnz's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Bing Maps Control on csMacnz's Blog

item.title: Bing Maps Control Series - 2: Add a simple map to your application
item.description: This is part 2 of a series on using the Silverlight Bing Maps Control. If haven’t already, check out part 1 . So Now that you have installed the Bing Maps Silverlight Control, and got yourself a key, you need to add the control to your project. For completeness, lets start by creating a new Silverlight 4 Application Project in Visual Studio 2010, and open up the MainPage.xaml file. Now before we can add the control, we need a reference to it.

item.title: Bing Maps Control Series - 1: Downloading and Installing the Tools
item.description: Over the last month or so I have has the opportunity to develop using the Bing Maps Control for Silverlight, and thought it appropriate to share this experience as well as a bit of a ‘how to’ on using it. I plan for this to be a bit of a series based on the following items: - Downloading and Installing the Tools. Add a Simple map to your application.
